Primary Contact: Crystal Davidson, Program Logistics Coordinator; Email: crystald@adaptiveadventures.ca
Alternate Contact: Dawn Widdifield, Executive Director; Email: dawnw@adaptiveadventures.ca
Service Details: - Provides day and evening excursions that run throughout the Okanagan region specifically designed to enable all people--regardless of disability--to enjoy the benefits of outdoor recreation- Programs include cycling, hiking, and kayaking for the spring and summer- Winter programs include Sherpa hiking, snowshoeing, and cross-country skiing- Programs vary in location and suit a variety of interests, usually start at both 10:00am and 1:00pm and are typically 2 hours long and time-based programs
How to Apply: Please call, email or visit our website
